005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidArgumentFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.OperationFunctions;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDayTimeDurationItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IYearMonthDurationItem;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CustomCollectors;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
025
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.Map;
029import java.util.function.BiFunction;
030import java.util.function.BinaryOperator;
031import java.util.stream.Collectors;
032
033import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
034import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
035
036/**
037 * An implementation of XPath 3.1
038 * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-avg">fn:avg</a>.
039 */
040@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
041public final class FnAvg {
042  private static final String NAME = "avg";
043
044  @NonNull
045  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
046      .name(NAME)
047      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
048      .deterministic()
049      .contextIndependent()
050      .focusIndependent()
051      .argument(IArgument.builder()
052          .name("arg")
053          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
054          .zeroOrMore()
055          .build())
056      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
057      .returnZeroOrOne()
058      .functionHandler(FnAvg::execute)
059      .build();
060
061  private FnAvg() {
062    // disable construction
063  }
064
065  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
066  @NonNull
067  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> execute(
068      @NonNull IFunction function,
069      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
070      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
071      IItem focus) {
072    ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
073        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
074
075    List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items = sequence.getValue();
076
077    return ISequence.of(average(items));
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
082   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-avg">fn:avg</a>.
083   *
084   * @param items
085   *          the items to average
086   * @return the average
087   */
088  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CyclomaticComplexity")
089  @Nullable
090  public static IAnyAtomicItem average(@NonNull Collection<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
091    if (items.isEmpty()) {
092      return null; // NOPMD - readability
093    }
094
095    // tell cpd to start ignoring code - CPD-OFF
096
097    Map<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>, Integer> typeCounts = FunctionUtils.countTypes(
098        OperationFunctions.AGGREGATE_MATH_TYPES,
099        ObjectUtils.notNull(items));
100
101    int count = items.size();
102    int dayTimeCount = typeCounts.getOrDefault(IDayTimeDurationItem.class, 0);
103    int yearMonthCount = typeCounts.getOrDefault(IYearMonthDurationItem.class, 0);
104    int numericCount = typeCounts.getOrDefault(INumericItem.class, 0);
105
106    IAnyAtomicItem retval;
107    if (dayTimeCount > 0) {
108      if (dayTimeCount != count) {
109        throw new InvalidArgumentFunctionException(
110            InvalidArgumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT_TYPE,
111            String.format("Values must all be of type '%s'.", IDayTimeDurationItem.class.getName()));
112      }
113
114      List<IDayTimeDurationItem> values = items.stream()
115          .map(item -> (IDayTimeDurationItem) item)
116          .collect(Collectors.toList());
117      retval = averageDayTimeDurations(ObjectUtils.notNull(values));
118    } else if (yearMonthCount > 0) {
119      if (yearMonthCount != count) {
120        throw new InvalidArgumentFunctionException(
121            InvalidArgumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT_TYPE,
122            String.format("Values must all be of type '%s'.", IYearMonthDurationItem.class.getName()));
123      }
124
125      List<IYearMonthDurationItem> values = items.stream()
126          .map(item -> (IYearMonthDurationItem) item)
127          .collect(Collectors.toList());
128      retval = averageYearMonthDurations(ObjectUtils.notNull(values));
129    } else if (numericCount > 0) {
130      if (numericCount != count) {
131        throw new InvalidArgumentFunctionException(
132            InvalidArgumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT_TYPE,
133            String.format("Values must all be of type '%s'.", INumericItem.class.getName()));
134      }
135
136      List<INumericItem> values = items.stream()
137          .map(item -> IDecimalItem.cast(ObjectUtils.notNull(item)))
138          .collect(Collectors.toList());
139      retval = averageNumeric(ObjectUtils.notNull(values));
140    } else {
141      throw new InvalidArgumentFunctionException(
142          InvalidArgumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT_TYPE,
143          String.format("Values must all be of type '%s'.",
144              OperationFunctions.AGGREGATE_MATH_TYPES.stream()
145                  .map(Class::getName)
146                  .collect(CustomCollectors.joiningWithOxfordComma(","))));
147    }
148
149    // resume CPD analysis - CPD-ON
150
151    return retval;
152  }
153
154  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UnnecessaryCast")
155  @NonNull
156  private static <T, R extends T> R average(
157      @NonNull Collection<? extends T> items,
158      @NonNull BinaryOperator<T> adder,
159      @NonNull BiFunction<T, IIntegerItem, R> divider) {
160    T sum = items.stream()
161        .map(item -> (T) item)
162        .reduce(adder)
163        .get();
164    return ObjectUtils.notNull(divider.apply(sum, IIntegerItem.valueOf(items.size())));
165  }
166
167  /**
168   * Get the average of a collection of day/time duration-based items.
169   *
170   * @param items
171   *          the Metapath items to average
172   * @return the average
173   */
174  @NonNull
175  public static IDayTimeDurationItem
176      averageDayTimeDurations(@NonNull Collection<? extends IDayTimeDurationItem> items) {
177    return average(
178        items,
179        (BinaryOperator<IDayTimeDurationItem>) OperationFunctions::opAddDayTimeDurations,
180        (BiFunction<IDayTimeDurationItem, IIntegerItem,
181            IDayTimeDurationItem>) OperationFunctions::opDivideDayTimeDuration);
182  }
183
184  /**
185   * Get the average of a collection of year/month duration-based items.
186   *
187   * @param items
188   *          the Metapath items to average
189   * @return the average
190   */
191  @NonNull
192  public static IYearMonthDurationItem
193      averageYearMonthDurations(@NonNull Collection<? extends IYearMonthDurationItem> items) {
194    return average(
195        items,
196        (BinaryOperator<IYearMonthDurationItem>) OperationFunctions::opAddYearMonthDurations,
197        (BiFunction<IYearMonthDurationItem, IIntegerItem,
198            IYearMonthDurationItem>) OperationFunctions::opDivideYearMonthDuration);
199  }
200
201  /**
202   * Get the average of a collection of numeric items.
203   *
204   * @param items
205   *          the Metapath items to average
206   * @return the average
207   */
208  @NonNull
209  public static IDecimalItem averageNumeric(@NonNull Collection<? extends INumericItem> items) {
210    return average(
211        items,
212        (BinaryOperator<INumericItem>) OperationFunctions::opNumericAdd,
213        (BiFunction<INumericItem, IIntegerItem, IDecimalItem>) OperationFunctions::opNumericDivide);
214  }
215}
